definitions.text: the greatest possible degree of something
examples: what he did was beyond the bounds of acceptable behavior
to the limit of his ability

definitions.text: as far as something can go
the boundary of a specific area
the mathematical value toward which a function goes as the independent variable approaches infinity
the greatest amount of something that is possible or allowed
examples: there are limits on the amount you can bet
it is growing rapidly with no limitation in sight
restrict the use of this parking lot
limit the time you can spend with your friends
I limit you to two visits to the pub a day
